strings:
<voice_0x01001899><se_low>King Trode: Ah...there you are, my boy.
Ahem. I confess, I am privy to what you and King Clavius just discussed.
<voice_0x0100189A><se_low>King Trode: Now I do understand how you feel. But this is a match the two royal families have planned for many years.
<voice_0x0100189B><se_low>King Trode: I'm afraid you have said rather too much on this occasion. Most unlike you.
<voice_0x0100189C><se_low>King Trode: Never fear, however. I shall apologise to the King on your behalf. Now hurry along back to the inn.
